mapper.insert: insert into SYS_LOV_COLUMN (LOV_CODE, COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TITLE, DISPLAY_FLAG, RETURN_VALUE_FLAG, RETURN_TEXT_FLAG, DISPLAY) values (#{lovCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{returnValueFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{returnTextFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{display,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select LOV_CODE, COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TITLE, DISPLAY_FLAG, RETURN_VALUE_FLAG, RETURN_TEXT_FLAG, DISPLAY from SYS_LOV_COLUMN
